headline: Investors are scrambling for portfolio alternatives. A CIO urges caution — especially with private credit
summary: Interest in private markets and other alternatives is growing as markets grow more concentrated. Mercer's Niall O'Sullivan said investors should be careful.

headline: Think You Can Hide From The AI Bubble? Think Twice
summary: Massive AI CapEx and passive investing flows are inflating not just tech stocks but also related (indirectly linked) assets. Discover the full analysis here.
